version_description: Bug fixes
Bug fixes
We appreciate all your feedback and we’re always striving to make the Amazon App better for you. This release improves performance and helps the app run smoother.
We appreciate all your feedback and we’re always striving to make the Amazon App better for you. This release improves performance and helps the app run smoother.

We appreciate all your feedback and we’re always striving to make the Amazon App better for you. This release improves performance and helps the app run smoother.

Tip: Did you know that Prime customers in the US can easily order household products just by saying it or scanning it? There is now an all-new Amazon Dash to do so.

This release fixes two critical bugs:
 
1. We fixed a bug in this release so your Cart won’t freeze up when you switch between apps on your iPhone
2. There was an issue that we fixed when trying to find an Amazon Locker near you. Amazon Locker provides you with a self-service delivery location to pick up and return your Amazon.com packages.
 
Thanks for all your feedback and enjoy shopping!

This release fixes two critical bugs:
 
1. We fixed a bug in this release so your Cart won’t freeze up when you switch between apps on your iPhone
2. There was an issue that we fixed when trying to find an Amazon Locker near you. Amazon Locker provides you with a self-service delivery location to pick up and return your Amazon.com packages.
 
Thanks for all your feedback and enjoy shopping!
Like a bottle of good wine, Amazon keeps getting better with age. The same goes with this release. Cheers!
This release contains a fix for an issue affecting a small number of users. After this fix, users affected by this will be able to browse the app without being prompted to login numerous times.

We are always working to improve your experience by making the app faster and more reliable. This release contains bug fixes and performance improvements.
Did you know you can quickly and easily build your shopping list by long-holding an image to bring up a bottom tray and swipe the item into it?  Go ahead, try it out.

We are always working to improve your experience by making the app faster and more reliable. This release contains bug fixes and performance improvements.

Hungry? Get 1-hour delivery from your favorite restaurants with Amazon Restaurants. Exclusively for Prime members in select cities.  Save $10 on your first order with MOBILE10. Restrictions apply; see www.amazon.com/10-off

Enjoy our latest update where we have fixed some bugs and improved our app to provide you a seamless shopping experience.

Say hello to Alexa on iPhone! Tap the mic icon and ask Alexa to play music, shop, tell jokes, read Kindle Books, control smart home devices on the go and more. Enjoy our latest update where we have fixed some bugs and improved our app to provide you a seamless shopping experience.

Have you tried Alexa's fun skills? Tap the mic to ask things like "tell me a dog fact", "magic 8 ball will I be rich?" or try Amazon Prime Music "play happy and fun music.”

Subscribe to receive recurring orders and save. Just open the menu in the Amazon App for iPhone, go to Programs and Features and try Subscribe & Save.

Have you tried the new credit or debit card scanner? Try it next time you need to add a credit/debit card during Checkout.

Shop exclusive products from sellers selling only on Amazon. Just open the menu in the Amazon App for iPhone, go to Programs and Features, and try Amazon Exclusives.
Shop exclusive products from sellers selling only on Amazon. Just open the menu in the Amazon App for iPhone, go to Programs and Features, and try Amazon Exclusives.
Explore stories, ideas from people with similar interests as you, and discover new and interesting finds. Just open the menu in the Amazon app for iPhone and swipe left to try out the cards.
Explore stories, ideas from people with similar interests as you, and discover new and interesting finds. Just open the menu in the Amazon app for iPhone and swipe left to try out the cards.

Spark is a new feature in the Amazon App in the U.S. that allows you to discover and shop stories, ideas, and more from people who share your interests. Just open the menu in the Amazon App for iPhone, swipe left, and tap on the Spark card.

Spark is a new feature in the Amazon App in the U.S. that allows you to discover and shop stories, ideas, and more from people who share your interests. Just open the menu in the Amazon App for iPhone, swipe left, and tap on the Spark card.

Use AR Stickers to see products in augmented reality, such as couches or lamps in your living room. Or see how products, such as sunglasses, look on you. Find it by tapping on the Camera Search button in the top right of the app.

Get yourself and your home prepped for a wedding or baby's arrival. Just open the menu in the Amazon App, go to See All Programs, and try Gift Cards and Registry.
Enjoy our latest update where we have fixed some bugs and improved our app to provide you with a seamless shopping experience.
This update delivers a fix to support landscape mode on iPad.

Use AR View to see how products such as furniture, speakers, and coffeemakers fit in your room before you buy them. Tap the camera in the Amazon app and then tap AR View to browse products in AR. AR View is available in the Amazon App for iOS 11 iPhone customers in the U.S.

Introducing a new way to shop for teens. With their own logins, teens can shop, stream, and game their way using the Amazon shopping app. Parents can review order details and approve with a quick text reply. Go to amazon.com/teeninfo to learn more.

Looking to ship products internationally? Choose “International Shopping” after downloading the app, or in the Amazon settings menu, to shop for products that Amazon can deliver around the world. Now you can shop in English, Spanish, German, and Simplified Chinese.

Looking to ship products internationally? Choose “International Shopping” after downloading the app, or in the Amazon settings menu, to shop for products that Amazon can deliver around the world. Now you can shop in English, Spanish, German, and Simplified Chinese.
Shop products under $10 with free shipping. Open the menu, go to See All Programs and try $10 & Under. This feature is available on iPhone for US customers only.
Fixed an issue regarding the functionality of certain tool bar selections in the top navigation bar of the app.
Enjoy our latest update where we have fixed some bugs and improved our app to provide you a seamless shopping experience.

Go on a shopping spree! Shop items under $10 with free shipping. Just open the menu, go to See All Programs and tap on $10 & Under, available on iPhone for US customers.

Did you know you can trade in your old Amazon device and select non-Amazon devices to receive credits and a discount towards a new Amazon device?  Just open the menu, go to 'See All Programs' and tap on 'Trade-In' to learn more about how you can upgrade and save with Trade-In. Available for U.S. customers on iPhone only.
